"<%me>, long time no see.": "Sorry if you're in a mission, but I needed to talk without being seen by anyone..."
"Right now, it seems like we're in the clear, and I'm not on assignment."
"Or to put it another way, I haven't gotten any assignments for a while."
"From what I can see, what I did before hasn't even been collected."
"Thanks to that, I've been able to calmly pass the time lately."
"I wonder if they've managed to get their hands on some other personnel."
"It seems that disquieting things have become the norm lately. Let's both be on our guard."
